dialogs.dashboard.error.name.required: It is a mandatory field, please fill it.
dialogs.dashboard.error.name.maxlength: Please specify a name with max. 30 characters (incl. spaces).
dashboard.empty: Oh! It seems like your Dashboard is empty. You can add favorites from the App Menu or with the gearwheel icon of the dashboard.

dialogs.favorite.error.address.uri: The address is not correct. Please follow the instructions below.
dialogs.favorite.info.address.uri:
Web address - Example: https://coma.bmwgroup.net.

File URI - Windows UNC compatible network share (currently only supported by IE11) - Example: file:\\share\folder\file.txt
dialogs.favorite.info.address.nolocaluri: Address to local filesystem is not supported!
dialogs.favorite.buttons.crop.crop.forma: Please select the desired image and tile format for your favorite.

dialogs.favorite.popup.file.error.messag: The picture must be in JPG or PNG format and should not be larger than 3 MB in size. Please try again to upload the file.

guidedtour.welcome.step.zero.title: Welcome
guidedtour.welcome.step.zero.description: {{name}}, welcome to ItO Workplace. Want to join our Guided Tour?
guidedtour.welcome.step.one.title: Applications menu
guidedtour.welcome.step.one.description: That's the place were all the apps are at home. Just drag your favorites to the dashboard to have immediate access.
guidedtour.welcome.step.two.title: Search
guidedtour.welcome.step.two.description: Want to find things instantly? Just type. The search will find apps, tasks and your colleagues. You can pass on your search to specialized search engines.
guidedtour.welcome.step.three.title: Create favorites
guidedtour.welcome.step.three.descriptio: Want to bookmark a webpage or a file? This function creates a favorite on the dashboard.
guidedtour.welcome.step.four.title: Tasks
guidedtour.welcome.step.four.description: Get things done! All your tasks are now combined in one list.
